statements.query: MATCH ((n:EC2Subnet)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})) where EXISTS(n.exposed_internet) WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE REMOVE n.exposed_internet, n.exposed_internet_type return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (route:EC2Route{destination_cidr_block: '0.0.0.0/0'})<-[:MEMBER_OF_ROUTE_TABLE]-(:EC2RouteTable)-[:HAS_ASSOCIATION]->(:EC2RouteTableAssociation)<-[:HAS_EXPLICIT_ASSOCIATION|:HAS_IMPLICIT_ASSOCIATION]-(subnet:EC2Subnet)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WITH route, subnet WHERE route.gateway_id STARTS WITH 'igw-' AND (NOT EXISTS(subnet.exposed_internet_type)) OR (NOT 'public_subnet_ipv4' IN subnet.exposed_internet_type) SET subnet.exposed_internet = true, subnet.exposed_internet_type = coalesce(subnet.exposed_internet_type , []) + 'public_subnet_ipv4';

MATCH (route:EC2Route{destination_ipv6_cidr_block: '::/0'})<-[:MEMBER_OF_ROUTE_TABLE]-(:EC2RouteTable)-[:HAS_ASSOCIATION]->(:EC2RouteTableAssociation)<-[:HAS_EXPLICIT_ASSOCIATION|:HAS_IMPLICIT_ASSOCIATION]-(subnet:EC2Subnet)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WITH route, subnet WHERE route.gateway_id STARTS WITH 'igw-' AND (NOT EXISTS(subnet.exposed_internet_type)) OR (NOT 'public_subnet_ipv6' IN subnet.exposed_internet_type) SET subnet.exposed_internet = true, subnet.exposed_internet_type = coalesce(subnet.exposed_internet_type , []) + 'public_subnet_ipv6';

name: AWS ec2 subnet asset internet exposure
